```{r, include = FALSE}
library(maps)
library(viridis)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidycensus)
```

```{r, include = FALSE}
EV <- read_csv("Data/EV.csv")
us_states <- map_data("state")
age20 <- get_decennial(geography = "state", 
                       variables = "P13_001N", 
                       year = 2020,
                       sumfile = "dhc") |> mutate(NAME = str_to_lower(NAME))
head(age20)
```

```{r}
age20 |>
  right_join(us_states, by = c("NAME" = "region")) |> 
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = long, y = lat,
                          group = group)) + 
  geom_polygon(aes(fill = value), color = "black") + 
  labs(fill = "Population percent change") +
  coord_map() + 
  theme_void() +  
  scale_fill_gradient2()
```
